properties.gymSchedule: Mondays to Fridays, 9:00 am - 8:00 pm | Saturdays and Holidays, 9:00 am - 7:00 pm
properties.gymDescription: Programs offered include: Fat Reduction, Weight Gain, Body Shaping for Women, Body Building for Men, Total Fitness Program for Adults, Power Training for Sports, and Circuit Weight Training.
A facility which includes 3 full size courts and multiple areas of varying dimensions.
properties.gymPromo: Reservation details may be accessed at: http://chk.upd.edu.ph/p/facilities.html (Rates may be different from what are indicated at the page)

properties.gymSchedule: Open all day from Sundays to Saturdays.
properties.gymDescription: The set of equipment includes the arm push-up, elliptical machine, single seesaw, and double seesaw.

properties.gymSchedule: Open all day from Sunday to Saturday.
properties.gymDescription: A set of outdoor equipment installed following the donation agreement with SOGO Group of Hotels.

properties.gymSchedule: Open all day from Sundays to Saturdays.
properties.gymDescription: A set of outdoor equipment installed following the donation agreement with SOGO Group of Hotels.

properties.gymSchedule: The schedule of use of the area may be from 1 am to 11 pm.
properties.gymDescription: Christy Hernandez Activity Center (a.k.a. Eng'g CHAC) has been the go-to location for most Engineering-related activities requiring a relatively large, covered area.
properties.gymPromo: Reserve by filling out a reservation form from the Administrative Staff Office. All requirements and payments are indicated on said form.

properties.gymDescription: The Yakal Residence Hall Court may be reserved by a group consisting of at least 1 Yakal Resident and at most 10 outsiders for each reserved schedule.
properties.gymPromo: Reservation must be made by a Yakal Resident.

properties.gymSchedule: The pool is open daily from 8 am - 8 pm.
properties.gymDescription: The pool is located beside the University of the Philippines Chapel and may cater to outsiders during Sundays and holidays only. The use of the pool by PE classes and by the varsity members of the university is a priority over all else. Private individuals or groups which are not classified as UP students or UP Employees need to reserve their schedule of use of the pool in the College of Human Kinetics through Jeng Borillo.

The UP Tennis Court is located beside Melchor Hall (a.k.a. College of Engineering Building) and is able to cater anyone who would like to make use of the court at hours during which no PE class is being conducted and no varsity practice is ongoing.
properties.gymPromo: Students are given 1 free hour from Mondays to Fridays
properties.gymDrate: Outsider - 60, UP Employee - 60, UP Student - 30 (Rackets can be rented at 50 a piece and tennis balls at 50 for 5 pieces)

properties.gymSchedule: Mondays to Fridays from 10 am - 4 pm, Weekends and Holidays from 8 am - 4 pm.
properties.gymDescription: The UP Archery Range is open to all individuals who would like to practice their archery skills at a relatively lower price compared to archery ranges outside the campus.
properties.gymPromo: Individual Rate for 2 hours (Outsider - 300, UP Employee - 200, UP Student - 200), Group Rate (Outsider - 750, UP Employee - 750, UP Student - 750)

properties.gymDescription: A basketball court used mainly for Basketball PEs and UP Men's Basketball Team practices.
